pages.name: Ritual of the Green Grove
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner)Ritual Diviner$(/l) for easier construction.
Grows crops within its area.$(br2)$(water)Water Runes: 4$() $(br)$(earth)Earth Runes: 4$() $(br2)Total Runes: 8

pages.title: Raw
pages.text: Increases the speed of all ritual operations based on the total amount of $(raw)Raw Will$() in the Aura.

pages.title: Corrosive
pages.text: Entities within range are attacked by nearby plants, leeching away their life to feed their own growth.

pages.title: Vengeful
pages.text: Increases the rate that a growth tick is successful.

pages.title: Destructive
pages.text: Increases the maximum growth range of the ritual based on the total amount of $(destructive)Destructive Will$() in the Aura.

pages.title: Steadfast
pages.text: Seeds are replanted and blocks are hydrated within the specified range.

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Growth) The area that the ritual will grow plants in. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: 81 $(li)Horizontal Radius: 4 $(li)Vertical Radius: 4

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Steadfast) Blocks within this range are rehydrated into farmland, and seeds within the area are planted nearby. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 15 $(li)Vertical Radius: 15

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Corrosive) Entities in this area have their life drained to grow nearby crops. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 15 $(li)Vertical Radius: 15
